content.html: We're getting the #NottTechParty prizes ready! 🎉🎁 Thanks to @WealthKernel for donating THREE Elegoo Uno Arduino starter kits for three lucky attendees to win 🔌⚡️🎲 We think @nottsiot will have some good ideas for these 💡 Join us Monday 6th nott.tech/xmas21
content.value:
We're getting the #NottTechParty prizes ready! 🎉🎁

Thanks to @WealthKernel for donating THREE Elegoo Uno Arduino starter kits for three lucky attendees to win 🔌⚡️🎲

We think @nottsiot will have some good ideas for these 💡

Join us Monday 6th nott.tech/xmas21
